001package org.gbif.predicate.query;
002
003import java.util.Optional;
004import org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.search.OccurrenceSearchParameter;
005
006public class OccurrenceEsQueryVisitor extends EsQueryVisitor<OccurrenceSearchParameter> {
007  public OccurrenceEsQueryVisitor(
008      EsFieldMapper<OccurrenceSearchParameter> esFieldMapper, String defaultChecklistKey) {
009    super(esFieldMapper, defaultChecklistKey);
010  }
011
012  @Override
013  protected Optional<OccurrenceSearchParameter> getParam(String name) {
014    try {
015      return OccurrenceSearchParameter.lookup(name);
016    } catch (Exception ex) {
017      return Optional.empty();
018    }
019  }
020}
